newsitem.title: USA: Continental mechanics said set to file for union.
newsitem.headline: Continental mechanics said set to file for union.

text.p: Mechanics at Continental Airlines Inc will file Friday for repesentation by the Teamsters Union, the union said in a statement Thursday.
The mechanics would file a petition with the National Mediation Board and hold news conferences in Houston, Newark and Cleveland, the Teamsters said.

"An overwhelming majority of the approximately 5,000 mechanics have indicated support for the job security, better wages and benefits and respect on the job that a Teamsters contract can mean," the Teamsters said.
Teamster organizer Patrick Lacefield said he expected the National Mediation Board would check the union's figures against the company's before ordering a postal election.
